title: Toys and games market : market segmentation by value 2009
summary: This bar chart has 7 columns on the x axis representing Name, and Market share in each Name on the y axis.
The Market share is appeared to be the highest at Name Other and lowest at Name Plush toys.
The minimum Name Plush toys has got 5.98 times less Market share than the maximum Name Other.
min_summary: This bar chart has 7 columns on the x axis representing Name, and Market share in each Name on the y axis.
The maximum Market share 30.5 is found at Name Other and the minimum is found at Plush toys where Name is 5.1.
mid_summary: This bar chart has 7 columns on the x axis representing Name, and Market share in each Name on the y axis.
The Market share is appeared to be the highest at Name Other and lowest at Name Plush toys.
The minimum Name Plush toys has got 5.98 times less Market share than the maximum Name Other.
max_summary: This is a bar chart representing Name in the x axis and Market share in the y axis.
The Market share is highest at Name Other and lowest at Name Plush toys.
Second maximum Market share is found at Name Infant/Pre-school toys.
The Market share of Name Other is 5.98% larger than the minimum value at Plush toys.
Market share at Name Other is 30.5 , second place is Infant/Pre-school toys at 16.2, and thirdly is Activity toys at 15.1.
The Name Other has 2.13 times more Market share than average.
